properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 5:47PM CST until January 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Period of Heavy Snow This Evening...

* WHAT...Snow that could be briefly heavy this evening. Snow
accumulation of 2 to 5 inches possible. Northeast winds will
gust as high as 40 mph early this evening. This may lead to
further impacts, especially reduced visibility in snow this
evening.

* WHERE...Grundy, Kankakee and Livingston Counties.

* WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted this evening with accumulating
and blowing snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
